## How it works
Every pie is handmade with love, crafted with care, and baked using only high-quality Swiss ingredients.
Each pie is about 24 cm in diameter and serves 6–10 people — depending, of course, on how generous the slices are.

Orders can be picked up in Wallisellen, or delivery within the Zürich area may be arranged.
Because every pie and dessert is made from scratch — from resting the dough to letting the filling set — please allow at least 3 days’ notice for your order.

**Please note:** the order will be initialised only when payment has been done. If you'd like a custom order or have troubles with the payment with Twint, please contact me directly at <a href="mailto:hello@flakypieshop.com">hello@flakypieshop.com</a>

    <!-- Basic info -->
    <label for="name">Name</label>
    <input type="text" id="name" name="name" placeholder="required" required>

    <label for="email">Email</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" name="email" placeholder="required" required>

    <label for="phone">Phone Number</label>
    <input 
      type="tel" 
      id="phone" 
      name="phone" 
      pattern="[0-9+\s()-]{6,}" 
      placeholder="+41 79 123 45 67"

    <!-- Order details -->
    <label for="product">What would you like?</label>
    <select id="product" name="product" required>
      <option value="Cinnamon Apple Pie">Cinnamon Apple Pie</option>
      <option value="Sweet Potato Casserole Pie">Sweet Potato Casserole Pie</option>
      <option value="Chocolat-y Pecan Pie">Chocolat-y Pecan Pie</option>

      <option value="Sesame Rice Krispies Treats">Sesame Rice Krispies Treats</option>
      <option value="Cornbread with Bell Pepper Cream and Feta">Cornbread with Bell Pepper Cream and Feta</option>
      <option value="Biscuits">Biscuits</option>
    </select>

    <label for="message">Comments / Special Requests </label>
    <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="4" placeholder="Please note: Reservations are closed for November"></textarea>

    <!-- FormSubmit settings -->
    <input type="hidden" name="_subject" value="New Pie Order!">
    <input type="hidden" name="_captcha" value="false"> 


    <button type="submit">Submit Order</button>
  </form>
</section>


<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {

  const text = "Reservations are closed for November - Happy Thanksgiving!";
  const target = document.getElementById("announcement-text");

  if (!target) {
    console.error("announcement-text element not found!");
    return;
  }

  let i = 0;
  function typeWriter() {
    if (i < text.length) {
      target.textContent += text.charAt(i);
      i++;
      setTimeout(typeWriter, 50);
    }
  }

  typeWriter();
});
</script>
